CustomField.description: Check this option to hide client entry fields on Click-To-Schedule for public invitations when client information is provided by a parameter. Note that page will be cleared and will revert to data entry of client not found or has incomplete information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this option to hide client entry fields on Click-To-Schedule for public invitations when client information is provided by a parameter. Note that page will be cleared and will revert to data entry of client not found or has incomplete information.
CustomField.label: Hide Client Entry Fields on Public CTS
